mapper.insert: insert into memb_manage(mealtype, mealpic, mealkcal, mealname, date, day, confirm) values(#{mealtype}, #{mealpicture}, #{mealkcal}, #{mealname}, curdate(), #{day}, 0)
mapper.select: select t.*, m.name, p.titl, i.pimg from tcher_trainer t inner join memb m on t.tno = m.mno inner join promotion p on t.pno = p.pno inner join promotionimg i on t.pno = i.pno where t.mno = #{no} and i.titlepic = 1 order by t.sdt desc;
